attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the events surrounding Mrs Gibbons and the absolutely ridiculous sentence bestowed upon her by the even more ridiculous Sudanese government for having her pupils name a teddy mohammed, I think we need to halt aide in all of its forms to this country as a punishment.  We as taxpayers give money to this country, but not this time.  On no, enough is enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
